p: Marjoram oil, PAMAM G4.0 and the combined system were analyzed with Spectrum Tensor27 FT-IR Spectrometer, using KBr pellets FT-IR Spectrometer in the range of 400–4000 cm −1. All samples were mixed with KBr and pressed into a pellet before the measurement. Thermal gravimetric analysis (TGA) of marjoram essential oil, PAMAM, and oil/PAMAM were carried out using TG Analyzer (Mettler Toledo, Culumbus, OH, USA).
